Uses of Class
projetofinalpoo.Publication

  • Uses of Publication in projetofinalpoo

    Subclasses of Publication in projetofinalpoo
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Book
    A Book is a child object of a Publication so it inherits its methods and variables.
    class  BookChapter
    A BookChapter is a child class of the Book class (which is a child class of the Publication class) so it inherits their methods and variables.
    class  ConferenceArticle
    A ConferenceArticle is a child class of a Publication class so it inherits its methods and variables.
    class  ConferenceArticleBook
    A ConferenceArticleBook is a child class of the Book class (which is a child class of the Publication class) so it inherits their methods and variables.
    class  MagazineArticle
    A MagazineArticle is a child class of a Publication class so it inherits its methods and variables.
    Methods in projetofinalpoo that return types with arguments of type Publication
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Publication> CISUC.getPublicationsList()
    Returns a List of Publication objects
    java.util.List<Publication> CISUC.getPublicationsResearcher​(Researcher res)
    This method returns a list with all the publications of a researcher.
    java.util.List<Publication> CISUC.getPublicationsResearchGroup​(ResearchGroup resGroup)
    This method returns a List of Publications from a ResearchGroup given as parameter.
    java.util.List<Publication> CISUC.publicationsOfTheLast5Years​(java.util.List<Publication> publicationList, int currentYear)
    This method receives a Publication objects List and return a Publication objects List that has the Publications of the list as parameter which year of publication is only, at maximum, 5 years apart from a given date (given as parameter).
    Methods in projetofinalpoo with parameters of type Publication
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void CISUC.addPublication​(Publication publication)
    Adds a Publication object to the publicationsList
    int Publication.compareTo​(Publication pub)  
    Method parameters in projetofinalpoo with type arguments of type Publication
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Publication> CISUC.publicationsOfTheLast5Years​(java.util.List<Publication> publicationList, int currentYear)
    This method receives a Publication objects List and return a Publication objects List that has the Publications of the list as parameter which year of publication is only, at maximum, 5 years apart from a given date (given as parameter).
    void CISUC.readPublicationList​(java.util.List<Publication> publicationsList)
    This method shows on the console all the publications in a given Publication objects List, ordered by publication year (decreasing order), type of publication and impact factor.
